entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Swan River
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:44 PM CST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -19.3°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Swan River 3:00 PM CST Thursday 23 February 2023
Temperature: -19.3°C
Pressure / Tendency: 103.9 kPa falling
Humidity: 57 %
Wind Chill: -28
Dewpoint: -25.6°C
Wind: SSW 14 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Thursday night: A few clouds. Low minus 30.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Clearing near midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 30. Wind chill minus 28 this evening and minus 39 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of light snow. High minus 15. POP 30%
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. 30 percent chance of light snow late in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 15. Wind chill minus 39 in the morning and minus 23 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of light snow. Low minus 28. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of light snow in the evening and after midnight. Clearing before morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 28. Wind chill minus 25 in the evening and minus 37 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Thursday 23 February 2023
